meanings.definition: A unit of heredity that is transferred from a parent to offspring and is held to determine some characteristic of the offspring.
meanings.sent1: My mom and dad passed down their genes to me, giving me my eye color and hair type.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how genes are inherited from one generation to the next.
meanings.sent3: The genes in my family seem to have a sense of humor, as we all share the same quirky laugh.
meanings.sent4: Just like a recipe, our genes mix together to create a unique blend of traits.
meanings.sent5: The genes we inherit are like a blueprint that shapes who we are.

meanings.definition: The basic physical and functional unit of heredity.
meanings.sent1: DNA is made up of many genes, each carrying specific instructions for our body.
meanings.sent2: Genes play a crucial role in determining our physical characteristics and health.
meanings.sent3: The genes in our cells work together like a well-oiled machine, keeping us healthy.
meanings.sent4: In the intricate dance of life, genes are the choreographers guiding our development.
meanings.sent5: Understanding how genes function is key to unlocking the mysteries of heredity.
